data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Obock, Djibouti to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Obock, Djibouti
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Obock, Djibouti by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Obock, Djibouti. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 36 believers in Obock against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, I pray that the Afar people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Obock against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Obock, Djibouti.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Obock, Djibouti has a population of 26,500.

We estimate Obock has 36 people who might know Jesus, 540 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,923 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 736 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Obock that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
